sqlMap.select: select id, name from oskari_roles where is_guest is true;
select r.id, r.name from oskari_roles r, oskari_users u, oskari_role_oskari_user m where r.id = m.role_id and u.user_name = m.user_name and u.user_name = #id#
select r.id, r.name from oskari_roles r, oskari_users u, oskari_role_oskari_user m where r.id = m.role_id and u.user_name = m.user_name and u.id = #id#
sqlMap.statement: INSERT INTO oskari_role_oskari_user ( role_id, user_name ) VALUES ( #role_id#, #user_name# )
sqlMap.select: select r.id as id, r.name as name, m.name as ext from oskari_roles r, oskari_role_external_mapping m where m.roleid = r.id AND m.external_type=#type#
